sentences.cn: 五分之一加仑的波旁威士忌酒
第五大街上的一家旅馆

sentences.en: barbarian invasions of the fifth century
sentences.cn: 五世纪时野蛮人的入侵

sentences.en: Bergdorf Goodman has opened a men's store on Fifth Avenue.
sentences.cn: 波道夫·古德曼在第五大道上开了一家男装店。

sentences.en: Elections will now take place on November the twenty-fifth.
He has dropped back to the fifth in his class.
sentences.cn: 他在班上名次退居第五.

sentences.en: He was the fifth person to be killed in sectarian violence.
sentences.cn: 他是宗派暴力中的第5个罹难者。

sentences.en: High - street sales have fallen for the fifth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 主商业街区销量已经连续5个月下降了.

sentences.en: In the fifth line, read " hurry " for " harry " .
It is on the fifth floor of the hospital.
It's on the fifth floor, so we'd better take the elevator.
sentences.cn: 那是在六楼上，我们最好乘电梯。

sentences.en: Joe has recently returned from his fifth trip to Australia.
sentences.cn: 乔最近从他第5次澳大利亚之旅返回。

sentences.en: John's taxes averaged out to about a fifth of his income.
sentences.cn: 约翰缴付的税款平均达到他收入的五分之一左右.

sentences.en: Many were retired people, and just on a fifth were in their fifties.
sentences.cn: 许多都是退休的人，其中差不多有五分之一年龄在五十多岁。

sentences.en: The meeting should take place on the fifth of May.
This will be his fifth international championship and his third at senior level.
sentences.cn: 这将是他第五个世界冠军，第三个成人级别赛事的冠军。

sentences.en: Yesterday's emphatic victory was their fifth in succession.
sentences.cn: 昨天的大胜是他们连续第5场胜利。
